languages.text: "Да вы не представляете, что с людьми творят! При усадьбах дворян такого не увидишь, а вот если добраться до агропоселков... Стоит куда-то прийти псам губернатора, как все — считай, нет поселения! Сначала людей чем-то поят, от чего у них потом тела увечатся, потом уводят на какие-то собрания... я знаю — у меня родич сначала из такого поселка весточки слал, а потом пропал совсем! Как слухи про мутантов и безумцев слишком часто повторять начинают — присылают стражу и затыкают рот всем, на кого донесут! Мертвых поселений все больше и больше — что нам, сидеть и ждать, когда всех перебьют?!"

traits.locale_text: "Да вы не представляете, что с людьми творят! При усадьбах дворян такого не увидишь, а вот если добраться до агропоселков... Стоит куда-то прийти псам губернатора, как все — считай, нет поселения! Сначала людей чем-то поят, от чего у них потом тела увечатся, потом уводят на какие-то собрания... я знаю — у меня родич сначала из такого поселка весточки слал, а потом пропал совсем! Как слухи про мутантов и безумцев слишком часто повторять начинают — присылают стражу и затыкают рот всем, на кого донесут! Мертвых поселений все больше и больше — что нам, сидеть и ждать, когда всех перебьют?!"

languages.text: "You won't believe what they do to the people! You won't see much at the nobles' estates, but if you go out to the agri settlements... As soon as the governor's dogs come — that's it, that's the settlement gone! First, they make them drink some filth that cripples them after a while, then they take them to these gatherings... I know what I'm talking about — a cousin of mine from one of them settlements sent me letters at first, and then he was gone! If folks start talking too much about mutants and lunatics, they send the wardens and silence anyone who got reported! There are more and more of these dead settlements — what, are we supposed to sit and wait until we're all killed?"
languages.original_text: "Да вы не представляете, что с людьми творят! При усадьбах дворян такого не увидишь, а вот если добраться до агропоселков... Стоит куда-то прийти псам губернатора, как все — считай, нет поселения! Сначала людей чем-то поят, от чего у них потом тела увечатся, потом уводят на какие-то собрания... я знаю — у меня родич сначала из такого поселка весточки слал, а потом пропал совсем! Как слухи про мутантов и безумцев слишком часто повторять начинают — присылают стражу и затыкают рот всем, на кого донесут! Мертвых поселений все больше и больше — что нам, сидеть и ждать, когда всех перебьют?!"

traits.locale_text: "As soon as the governor's dogs come — that's it, that's the settlement gone! First they make them drink some filth that mutilates them after a while, then they take them to some shady gatherings... I should know — a cousin of mine from one of them settlements sent me letters at first, and then he was gone! If folks start talking too much about mutants and lunatics, they send the guards and silence anyone who got reported! There are more and more of these dead settlements — what, are we supposed to sit and wait until we're all killed?"

I should know — a cousin of mine from one of them settlements sent me letters at first, and then he was gone! If folks start talking too much about mutants and lunatics, they send the guards and silence anyone who got reported! There are more and more of these dead settlements — what, are we supposed to sit and wait until we're all killed?"

If folks start talking too much about mutants and lunatics, they send the wardens and silence anyone who got reported! There are more and more of these dead settlements — what, are we supposed to sit and wait until we're all killed?"

languages.text: “你根本不会相信他们对这里的人做了什么！在那些贵族的庄园里，你恐怕看不到任何异常，可只要你去农业定居点看一看……只要那个总督的走狗来了，好了，那个定居点就完蛋了！首先，他们会让那群人喝下臭烘烘的东西，那些人过不了多久就会残废。之后，他们会带那些人去参加集会……我知道我自己在说什么。我的一个表弟就来自这样的定居点，他一开始还会给我寄信，但在那之后，他就消失了！如果有人总是在谈论变种人和疯子的事情，他们就会派出守卫，让遭到举报的人彻底闭嘴！被毁灭的定居点越来越多。怎么，难道还要我们坐以待毙，直到我们全被杀光为止吗？”
languages.original_text: "You won't believe what they do to the people! You won't see much at the nobles' estates, but if you go out to the agri settlements... As soon as the governor's dogs come — that's it, that's the settlement gone! First, they make them drink some filth that cripples them after a while, then they take them to these gatherings... I know what I'm talking about — a cousin of mine from one of them settlements sent me letters at first, and then he was gone! If folks start talking too much about mutants and lunatics, they send the wardens and silence anyone who got reported! There are more and more of these dead settlements — what, are we supposed to sit and wait until we're all killed?"

languages.text: 「奴らが住民に何をしてるかなんて、あんたは信じないだろ！あんたはノーブルの財産を目の当たりにすることはないだろう、だが、もしあんたが開墾地に行けば…。総督の犬が来てすぐ――それで終いだ、その開拓地はお終いなんだよ！総督の犬はまず、そこの住民に汚水を飲ませる。時間がたつと、飲まされた奴は廃人になっちまう。そしたら、総督の犬どもは壊れた奴らをこんな具合の集まりに連れて行く…俺は今の話を知ってるんだ、そいつらの中に俺のいとこがいて、最初は手紙を送ってきてた。それからあいつは消えちまった！もし住民が変異体と精神錯乱についてもっと話題にすれば、あいつらはウォーデンを送って通告された奴を誰であろうと黙らせる！こうして住民が死んでいくばかりだ――俺たち全員殺されるまで、大人しく待ってろってことか？」
languages.original_text: "You won't believe what they do to the people! You won't see much at the nobles' estates, but if you go out to the agri settlements... As soon as the governor's dogs come — that's it, that's the settlement gone! First, they make them drink some filth that cripples them after a while, then they take them to these gatherings... I know what I'm talking about — a cousin of mine from one of them settlements sent me letters at first, and then he was gone! If folks start talking too much about mutants and lunatics, they send the wardens and silence anyone who got reported! There are more and more of these dead settlements — what, are we supposed to sit and wait until we're all killed?"

languages.text: "Ihr würdet nicht glauben, was sie den Leuten antun! In den Anwesen der Adligen sieht man es kaum, aber in den Agri-Ansiedlungen ... Sobald die Hunde der Gouverneurin kommen – Ende, Schluss mit der Ansiedlung! Erst müssen sie irgendeinen Dreck trinken, der sie nach einer Weile verkrüppelt, und dann geht es zu diesen Versammlungen ... Ich weiß, wovon ich rede ... ein Vetter von mir aus so einer Ansiedlung hat mir anfangs Briefe geschrieben und war dann plötzlich weg! Wenn die Leute zu viel über Mutanten und Wahnsinnige reden, kommen die Wächter und bringen alle zum Schweigen, die gemeldet wurden! Es gibt immer mehr dieser toten Ansiedlungen – sollen wir etwa herumsitzen und abwarten, bis wir alle getötet werden?"
languages.original_text: "You won't believe what they do to the people! You won't see much at the nobles' estates, but if you go out to the agri settlements... As soon as the governor's dogs come — that's it, that's the settlement gone! First, they make them drink some filth that cripples them after a while, then they take them to these gatherings... I know what I'm talking about — a cousin of mine from one of them settlements sent me letters at first, and then he was gone! If folks start talking too much about mutants and lunatics, they send the wardens and silence anyone who got reported! There are more and more of these dead settlements — what, are we supposed to sit and wait until we're all killed?"

Es gibt immer mehr dieser toten Ansiedlungen – sollen wir etwa herumsitzen und abwarten, bis wir alle getötet werden?"

languages.text: « Vous n'imaginez même pas comment ces gens traitent les ouvriers ! Tout a l'air normal si on s'arrête aux domaines des nobles, mais c'est dans les agri-villages que ça se passe... Dès que les chiens de la gouverneure débarquent, tout le monde est condamné ! Ils commencent par leur faire boire quelque chose qui les assomme pour le compte, et puis ils les emmènent à ces rassemblements... Je sais de quoi je parle : j'ai un cousin qui vivait dans un de ces villages et il a disparu du jour au lendemain ! Si les gens commencent à trop parler de mutants et de fous, ils envoient les gardiens faire taire tous ceux qui ont été dénoncés ! Il y a de plus en plus de ces villages déserts. Alors quoi, on est censés rester les bras croisés en attendant de tous se faire tuer ? »
languages.original_text: "You won't believe what they do to the people! You won't see much at the nobles' estates, but if you go out to the agri settlements... As soon as the governor's dogs come — that's it, that's the settlement gone! First, they make them drink some filth that cripples them after a while, then they take them to these gatherings... I know what I'm talking about — a cousin of mine from one of them settlements sent me letters at first, and then he was gone! If folks start talking too much about mutants and lunatics, they send the wardens and silence anyone who got reported! There are more and more of these dead settlements — what, are we supposed to sit and wait until we're all killed?"

Ils commencent par leur faire boire quelque chose qui les assomme pour les comptes, et puis ils les emmènent à ces rassemblements... Je sais de quoi je parle : j'ai un cousin qui vivait dans un de ces villages et il a disparu du jour au lendemain ! Si les gens commencent à trop parler de mutants et de fous, ils envoient les gardiens faire taire tous ceux qui ont été dénoncés ! Il y a de plus en plus de ces villages déserts. Alors quoi, on est censés rester les bras croisés en attendant de tous se faire tuer ? »

languages.text: «¡Lo que le hacen a la gente es impensable! No lo verás en las mansiones de los nobles, pero si vas a los asentamientos agrícolas... En cuanto llegan los perros de la gobernadora, ¡hasta ahí! ¡Arrasado! Primero les dan de beber una porquería que les arrebata las fuerzas y después se los llevan a esas reuniones... Sé muy bien lo que hacen: ¡un primo mío me estuvo enviando cartas desde un asentamiento hasta que desapareció! Si la gente empieza a hablar demasiado de mutantes y lunáticos, ¡envían a los guardias y silencian a todos los involucrados! Cada vez hay más asentamientos muertos... ¿Qué vamos a hacer, sentarnos a esperar nuestro turno?».
languages.original_text: "You won't believe what they do to the people! You won't see much at the nobles' estates, but if you go out to the agri settlements... As soon as the governor's dogs come — that's it, that's the settlement gone! First, they make them drink some filth that cripples them after a while, then they take them to these gatherings... I know what I'm talking about — a cousin of mine from one of them settlements sent me letters at first, and then he was gone! If folks start talking too much about mutants and lunatics, they send the wardens and silence anyone who got reported! There are more and more of these dead settlements — what, are we supposed to sit and wait until we're all killed?"

Sé muy bien lo que hacen: ¡un primo mío me estuvo enviando cartas desde un asentamiento hasta que desapareció! Si la gente empieza a hablar demasiado de mutantes y lunáticos, ¡envían a los guardias y silencian a todos los involucrados! Cada vez hay más asentamientos muertos... ¿Qué vamos a hacer, sentarnos a esperar nuestro turno?».

languages.text: "Millete neler neler yaptıklarını görsen şaşarsın! Soyluların konaklarında pek görülen bir şey değil ama hele bir ziraat yerleşimlerine uğrasan... Valinin itleri mi geldi, o yerleşimi aklından çıkar! Önce bir süreliğine herkesi kötürüm bırakan iğrenç bir şey içiriyorlar, sonra da bir yerde topluyorlar... Bunların hiçbirini uydurmuyorum: O yerleşimlerde birinde yaşayan bir akrabam başta bana mektup yazıyordu, sonra sırra kadem bastı! Hele sıkıysa mutantlardan ve delilerden bahsetmeye başla... Gönderiyorlar muhafızları, susturuyorlar ihbar edilenleri! Böyle böyle kurutulan çok fazla yerleşim var... Ne yapalım, bekleyelim de sırayla hepimizi öldürsünler mi?"
languages.original_text: "You won't believe what they do to the people! You won't see much at the nobles' estates, but if you go out to the agri settlements... As soon as the governor's dogs come — that's it, that's the settlement gone! First, they make them drink some filth that cripples them after a while, then they take them to these gatherings... I know what I'm talking about — a cousin of mine from one of them settlements sent me letters at first, and then he was gone! If folks start talking too much about mutants and lunatics, they send the wardens and silence anyone who got reported! There are more and more of these dead settlements — what, are we supposed to sit and wait until we're all killed?"

Gönderiyorlar muhafızları, susturuyorlar ihbar edilenleri! Böyle böyle kurutulan çok fazla yerleşim var... Ne yapalım, bekleyelim de sırayla hepimizi öldürsünler mi?"
